channel.title: Golang on picobird's blog
channel.description: Recent content in Golang on picobird's blog

item.title: install go tools (Golang 1.6)
item.description:
免翻墙安装Go tools (Golang 1.6)

branch="release-branch.go1.6"
mkdir -p $GOPATH/src/golang.org/x

git clone -b $branch https://github.com/golang/tools.git $GOPATH/src/golang.org/x/tools
git clone https://github.com/golang/net.git $GOPATH/src/golang.org/x/net

cd $GOPATH
go install golang.org/x/tools/cmd/goimports
go install golang.org/x/tools/cmd/vet
go install golang.org/x/tools/cmd/oracle
go install golang.org/x/tools/cmd/godoc

参考内容crazygit@github
